site.title: Shenzhen Middle School Model United Nations
site.description: Official website of Shenzhen Middle School Model United Nations Association

hero.description: As one of the most influential student organizations at Shenzhen Middle School, we are committed to cultivating young talents with international perspectives, outstanding leadership, and profound humanistic literacy. Through Model UN conferences and international exchanges, we provide students with a professional platform to explore international affairs and exercise diplomatic skills.

home.news1_desc: PPRDMUN 2025 Second Announcement üá∫üá≥ Contains organizing committee information, chair list, and academic test submission reminder
home.news2_desc: "Progress comes from persistence." To better introduce PPRDMUN 2025, we specially launched an interview series, inviting the organizing committee to elaborate on the conference design concept and provide an overall introduction to the academic design.
home.news3_desc: PPRDMUN 2025 First Announcement üá∫üá≥ Contains conference setup, academic team registration, school and individual registration/academic test
home.news4_desc: The 16th Pan-Pearl River Delta Model United Nations Conference is now open for registration. Students from all schools are welcome to participate. Please download the relevant application forms and submit them before the deadline.
home.event1_desc: One of the most influential MUN conferences in South China, providing students with a professional platform to showcase diplomatic talents and enhance international understanding.
home.event2_desc: Regular academic training activities to enhance members' academic literacy and international affairs analysis capabilities.
home.event3_desc: Maintaining close contact with excellent MUN organizations at home and abroad to promote academic exchange and cooperation.
home.event4_desc: Annual recruitment for all students, welcoming those interested in international affairs to join our big family.
home.event5_desc: Building a strong alumni network to provide continuous support and career development guidance for members.
home.event6_desc: Inheriting the excellent traditions of SMSMUN and cultivating young leaders with international vision.
home.activities_desc: Leadership Summit, school conference, carnival and other exciting activities
home.guidance_desc: Providing professional development guidance and experience sharing for MUN clubs

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: SMSMUN, United for a Better World
about.intro_content: SMSMUN is one of the most influential student organizations at Shenzhen Middle School. We are committed to cultivating young talents with international perspectives, outstanding leadership, and profound humanistic literacy. Through Model UN conferences and international exchanges, we provide students with a professional platform to explore international affairs and exercise diplomatic skills.

academic.name: Academic
academic.description: Provides academic training for members and guidance for delegates. Explore international affairs and develop academic literacy together.
academic.intro: Academic Affairs Department is managed by three Academic Affairs Deputy Secretaries-General, providing regular academic training for members and guidance for conference delegates.
academic.resp1: Provide regular academic training for members
academic.resp2: Organize academic preparation for MUN conferences
academic.resp5: Handle post-conference academic summaries and feedback
academic.req3: Capable of academic training and guidance

administrative.name: Administrative
administrative.description: Manages daily activities, finances, and resources. Plays a crucial role from training to PPRD preparation.
administrative.intro: Administrative Department manages daily activities, financial management, and resource planning. From regular club activities to PPRD, it plays a pivotal role.
administrative.training_desc: Learn document writing standards and handle basic administrative tasks like venue booking and procurement.
administrative.carnival_desc: Handle booth applications, event planning, and material preparation, developing planning and adaptability skills.
administrative.sponsorship_desc: Communicate and negotiate with sponsors, learning business negotiation skills.
administrative.pprd_desc: Handle conference venue booking, material management, and financial planning.
administrative.req4: Interest in event planning and management

pr.name: Public Relations
pr.description: Manages external public relations, coordination and planning. Includes information release, recruitment, and sponsor liaison.

tech.name: Technology
tech.description: Creates promotional materials and merchandise. From poster design to video production, creates unique visual language.

history.title: SMSMUN History
history.event1_desc: Shenzhen Middle School Model UN Association officially established with the mission of "Civic Responsibility, Youth Mission".
history.event2_desc: Pioneered the first and second Shenzhen High School MUN Conference with innovation and leadership.
history.event3_title: PKU National MUN South China Branch
history.event3_desc: Partnered with Peking University to host the South China Branch, expanding SMSMUN's influence.
history.event4_desc: Hosted the Pan-Pearl River Delta MUN Conference, opening a new era for South China high school MUN.
history.event5_desc: The conference celebrates its 15th year, witnessing generations of MUN delegates grow.
history.event6_desc: SMSMUN celebrates 20 years, continuing to cultivate international talents.

alumni.title: Leadership
alumni.no_data: No data available for this year
alumni.name: Name

pprdmun.full_name: {year} Pan-Pearl River Delta High School Model United Nations Conference
pprdmun.english_name: Pan-Pearl River Delta Model United Nations Conference {year}
pprdmun.greeting: Dear Fellow MUN Organizations and Colleagues:
pprdmun.closing: We, the peoples of the United Nations, unite for a better world.
pprdmun.signature: {year} Pan-Pearl River Delta High School Model United Nations Conference Organizing Committee
pprdmun.title: PPRDMUN 2025
pprdmun.description: The 16th Pan-Pearl River Delta High School Model United Nations Conference, one of South China's most prestigious MUN events. Celebrating 15 years of excellence and the 20th anniversary of SMSMUN, we welcome delegates to this summer's conference in Shenzhen.
pprdmun.chinese_press_desc: Responsible for reporting important events in the Catalonia referendum process, analyzing various positions in depth, and providing timely and accurate Chinese news coverage for delegates to facilitate in-depth committee discussions.
pprdmun.english_press_desc: Focus on historical event coverage related to the 19th Amendment to the US Constitution, restoring the important moments when American women fought for suffrage in the early 20th century through English media perspective.
pprdmun.invitation_desc: Click the letter to view the complete invitation letter content
pprdmun.invitation_letter_desc: Everything is renewed, full of splendor, fifteen years of PPRDMUN gathering again under the phoenix crown and feathers

year_descriptions.2024: The 2024 Pan-Pearl River Delta High School Model United Nations Conference
year_descriptions.2023: 2023 is a year of vitality. The shadow of the pandemic is gradually dissipating, and the dawn of hope once again illuminates the world. Thirteen years of relentless dedication, thirteen years of forging ahead.
year_descriptions.2022: 2022 is a brilliant new year. Twelve years of unwavering commitment, twelve years of continuous progress. As MUNers, we maintain idealistic enthusiasm, striving towards independence and freedom.
year_descriptions.2021: 2021 is a prosperous new year. Twelve years of solidarity, twelve years of unwavering dedication. As MUNers, we set our hearts for heaven and earth, shoulder responsibility for the people, inherit the wisdom of sages, and create peace for generations.
year_descriptions.2020: 2020 is an extraordinary year. SMSMUN has traversed sixteen years. In the persistent dedication of Pan-Pearl MUN members, the belief's shimmer accumulates into beams of time, reflecting the ripples of the past.

alumni_forum.subtitle: SMSMUN Alumni Exclusive Communication Platform
alumni_forum.access_message: This page is only accessible to SMSMUN members (including current students and alumni). Please log in with your SMSMUN account first.

honor_advisors.title: Honor Advisory Committee
honor_advisors.subtitle: Shenzhen Middle School Model United Nations Association

features.title: Core Features of the Advisory Committee
features.consultation: Consultation Guidance: Provide valuable experience and advice when organizing important activities
features.sharing: Experience Sharing: Pass on MUN spirit and skills through online guidance meetings
features.priority: Priority Participation: Priority invitation to major association activities
features.honor: Honor Status: Identity marked in official documents, receive annual commemorative merchandise

honor_advisors.overview_content1: To strengthen connections between SMSMUN and outstanding former members, leverage graduate expertise, and enhance association activities, we established an Advisory Committee.
honor_advisors.overview_content2: The Advisory Committee is a consultative, non-executive body whose members provide guidance without direct participation in daily administration.
honor_advisors.overview_content3: As an Honor Advisor, you'll have the right to be consulted on important activities, participate in online guidance sessions and training, and receive priority invitations to major events.
honor_advisors.consultation_desc: Provide valuable experience and advice when organizing important activities.
honor_advisors.sharing_desc: Pass on MUN spirit and skills through online guidance sessions.
honor_advisors.priority_desc: Receive priority invitations to major events like annual meetings.
honor_advisors.honor_desc: Identity marked in official documents with annual commemorative merchandise.
honor_advisors.requirement1: Former member with outstanding contributions or excellent performance
honor_advisors.requirement2: Experience in MUN or related fields, able to provide constructive advice
honor_advisors.requirement3: Good character and shared values with the association

honor_advisor_badge.title: Honor Advisory Committee Member
honor_advisor_badge.subtitle: Congratulations! You have become an official member of the SMSMUN Honor Advisory Committee
honor_advisor_badge.exit_confirm: Are you sure you want to exit the Honor Advisory Committee?

leadership_summit.title: Shenzhen Model United Nations Leadership Summit 2024
leadership_summit.subtitle: Shenzhen Summit for Chief Leaders in Model United Nations
leadership_summit.overview_content: The Shenzhen Model United Nations Leadership Summit is organized by the SMSMUN Secretariat, targeting leaders and management members of MUN organizations from high schools across the city, aiming to promote cooperation and development of SBhenzhen high school MUN activities. Through in-depth and friendly exchanges, the summit strengthens unity among regional MUN associations, builds cooperation and mutual assistance platforms, discusses the development and prospects of Shenzhen MUN, and explores strategies for independent, professional, and innovative development of Shenzhen high school MUN activities.

details.location: Conference Location: Shenzhen Middle School (Nigang Campus)
details.theme: Conference Theme: Revitalization and Development of Offline MUN Activities in Shenzhen Region & Innovation and Heritage of MUN Organizations

carnival.title: Carnival
carnival.subtitle: SMSMUN Carnival Activity Review
carnival.description: The Carnival is one of the traditional activities of Shenzhen Middle School Model United Nations Association, held annually on campus. During the event, association members set up various interactive booths and games, attracting participation from the entire school's teachers and students, showcasing the charm of MUN culture.
